title: debit card rider
extract: abbreviation. (Retail: Payment technology) The PVV is the number encoded in the magnetic strip on the back of some types of debit or credit card, which allows the cardholder's PIN to be checked by ATMs and retail card readers.
extract_html: abbreviation. (Retail: Payment technology) The PVV is the number encoded in the magnetic strip on the back of some types of debit or credit card, which allows the cardholder's PIN to be checked by ATMs and retail card readers.
